languages.text: {n}Не изменившись в лице, Пощада молча сверлит вас взглядом.{/n}
{n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Не изменившись в лице, Пощада молча сверлит вас взглядом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}悯慈的表情毫无变化。他一言不发，双眼死死地盯着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈的表情毫无变化。他一言不发，双眼死死地盯着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}マーシーの表情は変わらない。アナタの目を見つめながら黙っていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーの表情は変わらない。アナタの目を見つめながら黙っていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Su expresión no cambia. Mercy te mira fijamente, clavando sus ojos en los tuyos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Su expresión no cambia. Mercy te mira fijamente, clavando sus ojos en los tuyos.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Impassible, Mercy vous fusille du regard sans dire un mot.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Impassible, Mercy vous fusille du regard sans dire un mot.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercys Miene ändert sich keinen Deut und er sagt nichts, während seine Augen sich förmlich in deine bohren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercys Miene ändert sich keinen Deut und er sagt nichts, während seine Augen sich förmlich in deine bohren.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Yüz ifadesi değişmeyen Merhamet, gözlerinin içine bakıp hiçbir şey söylemiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His expression unchanging, Mercy says nothing as his eyes bore into yours.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüz ifadesi değişmeyen Merhamet gözlerinin içine bakıyor ve hiçbir şey söylemiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
